function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Leakage from temporary water supply points or improperly drained storm water","Impact":"Increased breeding potential for malaria-causing mosquitoes","Mitigation":"Proper drainage and maintenance of temporary water supply points","Technologies":"Drainage systems, water leak detection systems","People":"Construction workers, nearby residents","Owner":"Construction project management team"},{"Description":"Malaria-causing mosquitoes access buildings through inlets and outlets, designed for air exchange","Impact":"Increased risk of malaria transmission within buildings","Mitigation":"Reducing the size and number of building openings, installing protective barriers","Technologies":"Insect screens, air curtains","People":"Building designers, construction workers","Owner":"Architects, building owners"},{"Description":"Changes in global wind patterns and increased rainfall propagate the spread of malaria","Impact":"Increased risk of malaria transmission due to favorable weather conditions","Mitigation":"Monitoring weather patterns, implementing mosquito control measures","Technologies":"Weather monitoring systems, mosquito control technologies","People":"Public health authorities, construction workers","Owner":"Public health agencies, construction project management team"}]}
